 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַל‎</span>] **verb** probably ==go about, from one to another== (for trade or gossip) (? connected with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגל‎</span>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***kick*** a horse, to make him go [? properly ***use the foot***, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ?]; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺכֵל‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רוֺכְלָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***trader***, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְכִילוּת‎</span> ***slander*** [compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***calumniator***, from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***go about***, Qor 2:19 and elsewhere]); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺכֵל‎</span> [[Song.3.6|Song 3:6]] feminine singular construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֶ֫לֶת‎</span> [[Ezek.27.3|Ezek 27:3]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכַלְתֵךְ‎</span> v[[Ezek.27.20|Ezek 27:20]] v[[Ezek.27.23|Ezek 27:23]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכְלִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.15|1Kgs 10:15]] +, etc.; — as substantive = ***trafficker, trader:*** usually plural, [[Nah.3.16|Nah 3:16]]; [[Ezek.17.4|Ezek 17:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר ר‎</span>), [[Ezek.27.13|Ezek 27:13]]; [[Ezek.27.15|Ezek 27:15]]; [[Ezek.27.17|Ezek 27:17]]; [[Ezek.27.22|Ezek 27:22]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.27.23|Ezek 27:23]]a (&lt; strike out Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]), v[[Ezek.27.24|Ezek 27:24]]; [[Neh.3.31|Neh 3:31]]; [[Neh.3.32|Neh 3:32]]; [[Neh.13.20|Neh 13:20]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרֵי כָלמִֿמְכָּר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְחַר הָר‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.15|1Kgs 10:15]] (text dubious; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> p.695); singular figurative of Tyre, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֶלֶת הָעַמִּים אֶלאִֿיִּים רַכִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.27.8|Ezek 27:8]], of a people v[[Ezek.27.20|Ezek 27:20]] v[[Ezek.27.23|Ezek 27:23]]b (plural Mez<sup>Harran 34</sup> [[BDB#Krae|Krae]], see also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּלְמֶד‎</span>); singular of person only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבְקַת רוֺכֵל‎</span> [[Song.3.6|Song 3:6]].
